thread.title: Sinkhole closes road near Union City middle school
thread.title_full: Sinkhole closes road near Union City middle school - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jenna Lyons
title: Sinkhole closes road near Union City middle school
text:
A sinkhole that formed on Alvarado Boulevard in Union City closed roads and hindered traffic on Wednesday, October 14, 2015. Courtesy of Alameda County Fire A sinkhole that formed on Alvarado Boulevard in Union City closed...
A sinkhole spanning the two westbound lanes of Alvarado Boulevard in Union City could make it difficult for parents to drop off or pick up their children at Alvarado Middle School over the next few days, city officials said.
